channel.title: CVE Feed for Beckhoff -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Beckhoff -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-6545|2024-08-27T16:10:41.931Z -- beckhoff -- authelia-bhf%20of%20twincat%2Fbsd
item.description: The package authelia-bhf included in Beckhoffs TwinCAT/BSD is prone to an open redirect that allows a remote unprivileged attacker to redirect a user to another site. This may have limited impact to integrity and does solely affect anthelia-bhf the Beckhoff fork of authelia.

item.title: CVE-2024-41174|2024-08-27T17:48:58.704Z -- beckhoff -- ipc%20diagnostics%20package
item.description: The IPC-Diagnostics package in TwinCAT/BSD is susceptible to improper input neutralization by a low-privileged local attacker.

item.title: CVE-2024-41176|2024-08-27T13:51:48.389Z -- beckhoff -- mdp%20package
item.description: The MPD package included in TwinCAT/BSD allows an authenticated, low-privileged local attacker to induce a Denial-of-Service (DoS) condition on the daemon and execute code in the context of user “root” via a crafted HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2024-41175|2024-08-27T13:47:06.701Z -- beckhoff -- ipc%20diagnostics%20package
item.description: The IPC-Diagnostics package included in TwinCAT/BSD is vulnerable to a local denial-of-service attack by a low privileged attacker.

item.title: CVE-2024-41173|2024-08-27T13:07:46.907Z -- beckhoff -- ipc%20diagnostics%20package
item.description: The IPC-Diagnostics package included in TwinCAT/BSD is vulnerable to a local authentication bypass by a low privileged attacker.

item.title: CVE-2024-41174|2024-08-27T08:01:09.810Z -- beckhoff -- ipc%20diagnostics%20package
item.description: The IPC-Diagnostics package in TwinCAT/BSD is susceptible to improper input neutralization by a low-privileged local attacker.

item.title: CVE-2024-41173|2024-08-27T08:00:47.054Z -- beckhoff -- ipc%20diagnostics%20package
item.description: The IPC-Diagnostics package included in TwinCAT/BSD is vulnerable to a local authentication bypass by a low privileged attacker.

item.title: CVE-2024-41175|2024-08-27T08:01:31.499Z -- beckhoff -- ipc%20diagnostics%20package
item.description: The IPC-Diagnostics package included in TwinCAT/BSD is vulnerable to a local denial-of-service attack by a low privileged attacker.

item.title: CVE-2024-41176|2024-08-27T08:01:57.443Z -- beckhoff -- mdp%20package
item.description: The MPD package included in TwinCAT/BSD allows an authenticated, low-privileged local attacker to induce a Denial-of-Service (DoS) condition on the daemon and execute code in the context of user “root” via a crafted HTTP request.
